item.title: Supergeeks #44—Coming Out of the Geeky Closet
item.dc:creator: ChronoFett
item.description: Join Jeff and Thomas for another Geeky episode as they discuss what’s been going on in the DC52 including “The Night of Owls”! Our Super Topic deals with homosexuality in comics and the big reveal of a new DC character coming out of the closet soon. Plus listener emails and Super Hero news from around [...]
item.content:encoded:
Join Jeff and Thomas for another Geeky episode as they discuss what’s been going on in the DC52 including “The Night of Owls”!  Our Super Topic deals with homosexuality in comics and the big reveal  of a new DC character coming out of the closet soon.  Plus listener emails and Super Hero news from around the Net.  Join us!

  • New movie trailers look amazing!
  • “The Great Gatsby” with Leonardo DiCaprio and Tobey Maguire
  • “The Watch” alien comedy with Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn, and Jonah Hill

Be part of the show:

  • Comment on the website.
  • Leave us Itunes reviews.
  • Email us at the email address:  Supergeeks@geekshowentertainment.com
  • Keep up with the show BEFORE we record by following Thomas on Twitter—-@ChronoFett

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #39 – Zitch Dog!
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description:
John Pavlich returns again for discussion on classic HIMYM episode, ‘Arrivederci Fierro’ .
On the cusp of reaching 200,000 miles in his beloved car, Marshall is forced to contemplate how his life is not turning out the way he planned. The gang gather round as the fate of the Fierro hangs in the balance and reminisce [...]
item.content:encoded:
John Pavlich returns again for discussion on classic HIMYM episode, ‘Arrivederci Fierro’ .

On the cusp of reaching 200,000 miles in his beloved car, Marshall is forced to contemplate how his life is not turning out the way he planned. The gang gather round as the fate of the Fierro hangs in the balance and reminisce about what the car means to them.
What is the 100k Fiasco? Who broke the windows in the Fierro that one time? Why won’t Marshall allow food in the car? Why does Barney hate it? And can the gang get it to that epic 200,000 miles?
Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

On the cusp of reaching 200,000 miles in his beloved car, Marshall is forced to contemplate how his life is not turning out the way he planned. The gang gather round as the fate of the Fierro hangs in the balance and reminisce about what the car means to them.

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #38 – With My Sister…
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description:
We welcome John Pavlich back to the podcast for discussion on episode “Stuff”.
Robin can’t let go of the past when she discovers that Ted has kept possessions accumulated during previous relationships. In a bid to please her, he discards the offending items which results in an unexpected revelation about her past. Meanwhile, Lily coaxes the [...]
item.content:encoded:
We welcome John Pavlich back to the podcast for discussion on episode “Stuff”.

Robin can’t let go of the past when she discovers that Ted has kept possessions accumulated during previous relationships. In a bid to please her, he discards the offending items which results in an unexpected revelation about her past. Meanwhile, Lily coaxes the gang to attend a play she is in and in the process initiates a conversation with Barney about how a ‘real’ friend should act.

How much stuff did Ted get from previous girlfriends? Who becomes part of Lily’s play? How will Barney prove his point? And where did Robin actually get her dogs from?

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!
Plus, Hayley talks about episodes 15-17 of Season 7 of HIMYM.
Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.
Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

Follow John on Twitter!

Visit the Sofadogs website.

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #37 – Destiny
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description:
Ted has the chance to interview for his dream job in this week’s episode, “Lucky Penny”.
Unfortunately for Ted, a dramatic chain of events seems to be preventing him from making his flight on time. All the gang are involved. Initially things seem simple but as the story goes on, more threads are revealed that might [...]
item.content:encoded:
Ted has the chance to interview for his dream job in this week’s episode, “Lucky Penny”.

Unfortunately for Ted, a dramatic chain of events seems to be preventing him from making his flight on time. All the gang are involved. Initially things seem simple but as the story goes on, more threads are revealed that might hold the key to the real reason why Ted is meant to go in another direction.

Who is to blame: Barney? Marshall? Robin? Lily? Why is Barney on the subway? Why does Lily want to camp out? How did Marshall break his toe? And could a penny really be the cause of all this chaos?

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!
Plus, Hayley talks about episodes 8-14 of Season 7 of HIMYM.
Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.
Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Plus, Hayley talks about episodes 15-17 of Season 7 of HIMYM.

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #36 – Don’t Forget the Dipping Sauce
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description:
An unexpected funeral derails the gang’s annual tradition of watching the Superbowl together in this week’s episode, “Monday Night Football”.
After threat of not being able to return to their favourite bar, Ted rallies the group to make a pact to go 18 hours without finding out the score of the Superbowl so they can keep [...]
item.content:encoded:
An unexpected funeral derails the gang’s annual tradition of watching the Superbowl together in this week’s episode, “Monday Night Football”.

After threat of not being able to return to their favourite bar, Ted rallies the group to make a pact to go 18 hours without finding out the score of the Superbowl so they can keep their tradition alive and watch the game together. Barney struggles with his gambling addiction; Marshall hides out in Lily’s Kindergarten classroom; and Robin jeopardizes her career, all to keep the pact alive.

Will Barney win or lose his money? Can Robin go a whole news cast without hearing the sports segment? Who is Marshall’s rival for Lily’s heart? And what on earth is the Sensory Deprivater 5000?

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Plus, Hayley talks about episodes 8-14 of Season 7 of HIMYM.

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #35 – New Dart
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description:
Ted’s former boss is making his life hell in this week’s episode, “Columns”.
Finally having enough of former supervisor Hammond Druthers, Ted sets about firing the man only to have circumstances stand in his way of his standing up for himself. Meanwhile the gang find a painting of a naked Marshall. After initially mocking the painting, [...]
item.content:encoded:
Ted’s former boss is making his life hell in this week’s episode, “Columns”.

Finally having enough of former supervisor Hammond Druthers, Ted sets about firing the man only to have circumstances stand in his way of his standing up for himself. Meanwhile the gang find a painting of a naked Marshall. After initially mocking the painting, Barney offers Lily money to immortalize him on canvas.

Will Ted find the courage to stand up for himself? Will Marshall let his girlfriend see another man naked? Whose shoes is Druthers wearing? And what will Barney think of his portrait?

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Plus, Hayley talks about more Season 7 of HIMYM. You can check out The Gilmore Girls Rewatch Podcast here that Hayley created the introduction for.

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

item.title: SuperGeeks #38—Lazy Day Geekin’
item.dc:creator: ChronoFett
item.description: Join Thomas and Jeff for another Geektastic episode. Jeff reviews Batman comics with the first crossover event of the new DC52! Plus the guys discuss Geeky TV and movies with a spoiler free review of “Chronicle”, a discussion of the new “DC Nation” and “Comic Book Men” with Kevin Smith. Plus super hero news and [...]
item.content:encoded:
Join Thomas and Jeff for another Geektastic episode.  Jeff reviews Batman comics with the first crossover event of the new DC52!  Plus the guys discuss Geeky TV and movies with a spoiler free review of “Chronicle”, a discussion of the new “DC Nation”  and “Comic Book Men” with Kevin Smith. Plus super hero news and a new Question of the Week.  Can’t wait to hear your thoughts!

Show Notes

  • Check out listener Don’s Green Goblin tattoo HERE
  • New San Diego Comic Con documentary Trailer
  • Watchmen prequels–See the covers here
  • DC Nation begins on Cartoon Network March 3rd!

Question of the Week

What Geeky artifact would you choose?

  • Lightsaber
  • Wizard’s Wand
  • Pokemon Ball
  • Dragonballs
  • The One Ring
  • Green Lantern ring

See the Photo of the Geeky Objects HERE!

.

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #34 – Saying Felafel
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description: For the first episode of 2012 Hayley discusses episode “First Time in New York”. Robin’s younger sister Katie comes to visit New York for the first time. Unfortunately her boyfriend is in tow and Katie is preparing to lose her virginity to him, which alarms Robin. Enlisting the help of her friends, Robin tries to convince [...]
item.content:encoded:
For the first episode of 2012 Hayley discusses episode “First Time in New York”.

Robin’s younger sister Katie comes to visit New York for the first time. Unfortunately her boyfriend is in tow and Katie is preparing to lose her virginity to him, which alarms Robin. Enlisting the help of her friends, Robin tries to convince her sister that she should wait for someone special to share her first time with. The gang reminisce about their first times while Robin struggles to tell Ted how she really feels about him.

Will Katie sleep with her boyfriend? Who did Lily really lose it to? How old was Barney his first time? Just how many ‘fun facts’ does Ted have? And can Robin really say those three little words?

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Plus, Hayley talks about Season 7 of HIMYM, The Muppets and Chelsea Gil’s song for Jason Segel. Check out the youtube here.

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

item.title: The Doctor’s Companion Ep. 83 – The Power of Mom
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.category: The Doctor the widow and the wardrobe
item.description: It’s Christmas time again and Scott and Matt are celebrating with the 2011 Matt Smith Christmas Special “The Doctor, the Widow, and the Wardrobe”. The Doctor crashes to Earth in 1938, narrowly escaping death by explosion, and is found by a local woman named Madge Arwell who helps him find the TARDIS. Three years later, [...]
item.content:encoded:
It’s Christmas time again and Scott and Matt are celebrating with the 2011 Matt Smith Christmas Special “The Doctor, the Widow, and the Wardrobe”. The Doctor crashes to Earth in 1938, narrowly escaping death by explosion, and is found by a local woman named Madge Arwell who helps him find the TARDIS. Three years later, the Doctor returns the favor by getting her children lost on another planet in the year 5345 just as all of the trees on the planet are being harvested for fuel. Can the Doctor figure out a way out of this mess and get Madge and her children back home for Christmas? What do the trees want with a human brain? Why didn’t Madge’s children age at all in three years? Find out in the newest episode of The Doctor’s Companion! And remember, BEWARE OF SPOILERS!!

Next: Tom Baker and “City of Death”!!

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #33 – Grinch is a Bad Bad Word
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description: We welcome Thomas Schembri back to the show for Christmas episode “How Lily Stole Christmas”. Lily has gone all out decorating the apartment in a Winter Wonderland as a reward for Marshall finishing his paper. All goes haywire when an old answering machine message from Ted to Marshall over the summer reveals that Ted called [...]
item.content:encoded:
We welcome Thomas Schembri back to the show for Christmas episode “How Lily Stole Christmas”.

Lily has gone all out decorating the apartment in a Winter Wonderland as a reward for Marshall finishing his paper. All goes haywire when an old answering machine message from Ted to Marshall over the summer reveals that Ted called Lily a really bad name. Lily removes all decorations from the apartment in anger causing Ted to spend his holiday with family in Staten Island. Elsewhere, Barney is sick and Robin must take care of him.

What did Ted really call Lily? Can she forgive him? What has a beer got to do with it? What has Marshall secretly been doing all day? And can the Winter Wonderland be restored before he arrives home?

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Merry Christmas everyone and a safe and happy holiday season. Talk to you in 2012!

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

item.title: The Doctor’s Companion Ep. 82 – Robot Disguise
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description: The Doctor meets his first Sontaran and Scott and Matt are experiencing pure bliss with the Jon Pertwee 4-part serial “The Time Warrior”. A Sontaran named Linx finds himself stuck in the middle ages and must join forces with a bandit named Irongron in order to steal scientists from the future to help him rebuild [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Doctor meets his first Sontaran and Scott and Matt are experiencing pure bliss with the Jon Pertwee 4-part serial “The Time Warrior”. A Sontaran named Linx finds himself stuck in the middle ages and must join forces with a bandit named Irongron in order to steal scientists from the future to help him rebuild his ship. Can the Doctor find out where all of these missing scientists are going to and who is behind it all?  Who is this headstrong young woman that has stowed away on the TARDIS? Just how many fantastic fights does the Doctor get into this time? Find out on the newest episode of The Doctor’s Companion! And remember, BEWARE OF SPOILERS!!

Next: Matt Smith and “The Doctor, The Widow, and The Wardrobe”!!

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #32 – Brotherly Love
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description: Barney’s brother arrives in town but is hiding a shocking secret in this week’s episode, “Single Stamina”. Poor Barney is left out in the cold as the rest of the gang are too busy enjoying being in ‘couple hibernation’ to go out on the town with him. Enter Barney’s gay and ultimate wingman brother, James. All [...]
item.content:encoded:
Barney’s brother arrives in town but is hiding a shocking secret in this week’s episode, “Single Stamina”.

Poor Barney is left out in the cold as the rest of the gang are too busy enjoying being in ‘couple hibernation’ to go out on the town with him. Enter Barney’s gay and ultimate wingman brother, James. All seems well, the rest of the gang even drag themselves out to a club for a night, but some slightly off behaviour by James causes them to believe he is keeping something from Barney concerning his ’single stamina’ or lack thereof.

How come Barney and James look so different? Will Ted and Marshall learn what it’s like to be hit on by guys? What is James hiding from his brother? And when he finds out, can Barney accept the man James has become?

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

item.title: The Doctor’s Companion Ep. 81 – Snake Charmed
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description: Tegan is possessed and Scott and Matt are impressed with more than just the effects in the Peter Davison 4-part serial “Kinda”. The TARDIS arrives on the planet Deva Loka where the Doctor and Adric are taken prisoner by the mad soldier Hindle while Tegan is possessed by a giant snake called The Mara. Can [...]
item.content:encoded:
Tegan is possessed and Scott and Matt are impressed with more than just the effects in the Peter Davison 4-part serial “Kinda”. The TARDIS arrives on the planet Deva Loka where the Doctor and Adric are taken prisoner by the mad soldier Hindle while Tegan is possessed by a giant snake called The Mara. Can the Doctor escape from Hindle and save Tegan before it’s too late? What happened to Nyssa? Why does everyone in dreamland having bleeding gums? Find out in the newest episode of The Doctor’s Companion! And remember, BEWARE OF SPOILERS!!

Next: Jon Pertwee and “The Time Warrior”!!

item.title: The Doctor’s Companion Ep. 80 – Cocoa Engagement
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description: The Doctor gets engaged and Scott and Matt are having a lot of fun with the William Hartnell 4-part serial “The Aztecs”. The TARDIS crew arrive in 15th century Mexico where Barbara is mistaken for a god and the Doctor accidentally gets engaged. Can Barbara use her god-like influence over the Aztecs to stop their [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Doctor gets engaged and Scott and Matt are having a lot of fun with the William Hartnell 4-part serial “The Aztecs”. The TARDIS crew arrive in 15th century Mexico where Barbara is mistaken for a god and the Doctor accidentally gets engaged. Can Barbara use her  god-like influence over the Aztecs to stop their  human sacrifices? Will the Doctor get out of his accidental engagement? How does Ian put Aztec warriors in their place? Find out in the newest episode of The Doctor’s Companion! And remember, BEWARE OF SPOILERS!!

Next: Peter Davison and “Kinda”!!

item.title: The Doctor’s Companion Ep. 79 – The Open Mind of Adam Mitchell
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description: The Doctor takes on a short-lived companion and Scott and Matt have a lot more to say than they thought about the Christopher Eccleston episode “The Long Game”. The Doctor arrives on a space station in the year 200,000 to show off the future to new companion Adam Mitchell, but all doesn’t go as planned [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Doctor takes on a short-lived companion and Scott and Matt have a lot more to say than they thought about the Christopher Eccleston episode “The Long Game”. The Doctor arrives on a space station in the year 200,000 to show off the future to new companion Adam Mitchell, but all doesn’t go as planned when they stumble upon a conspiracy involving people who are promoted to the 500th floor and never seen again. Can the Doctor find out who or what is pulling the strings on the 500th floor before it’s too late? Why is Adam getting a hole installed into his head? What do we think about Simon Pegg? Find out in the newest episode of The Doctor’s Companion! And remember, BEWARE OF SPOILERS!!

Next: William Hartnell and “The Aztecs”!!

item.title: The Doctor’s Companion Ep. 78 – The Honeybee Maneuver
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description: The Doctor is going to Disneyland and Scott and Matt have a great time with the Sylvester McCoy 3-part serial “Delta and the Bannermen”. The Doctor and Mel join a time/space tour group headed to 1950’s Disneyland until the shuttle-bus is thrown off course and into the middle of a deadly cat and mouse game [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Doctor is going to Disneyland and Scott and Matt have a great time with the Sylvester McCoy 3-part serial “Delta and the Bannermen”. The Doctor and Mel join a time/space tour group headed to 1950’s Disneyland until the shuttle-bus is thrown off course and into the middle of a deadly cat and mouse game between the murderous Bannermen and the Chimeron princess Delta. Can the Doctor stop the Bannermen, save the princess, and help the tour group fix their bus before it’s too late? What is the princess carrying in her egg? Why is Oscar Madison in Wales? Find out in the newest episode of The Doctor’s Companion! And remember, BEWARE OF SPOILERS!!

Next: Christopher Eccleston and “The Long Game”!!

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #31 – Ghosts of Malls Past
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description: Long-time friend of the show Bryan Jervah (aka ‘Keoki’) joins the podcast for discussion on classic How I Met Your Mother episode “Slap Bet”. Robin freaks out when the gang want to go to a mall. Not wanting to reveal why she doesn’t like malls, Ted is left to make up his own ideas (assisted [...]
item.content:encoded:
Long-time friend of the show Bryan Jervah (aka ‘Keoki’) joins the podcast for discussion on classic How I Met Your Mother episode “Slap Bet”.

Robin freaks out when the gang want to go to a mall. Not wanting to reveal why she doesn’t like malls, Ted is left to make up his own ideas (assisted by the others) as to what her secret might be. Marshall falls on one side of the argument, thinking Robin got married at a mall, while Barney believes she has a hidden past as a porn star. The two make a slap bet over who is right about Robin’s secret.

How will Ted cope if he learns his girlfriend is secretly married? What rulings will Lily lay down in her role as Slap Bet Commissioner? Who is right: Marshall or Barney? And what does a bedazzled jean jacket have to do with why Robin doesn’t want to go to the mall?

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #30 – Would You Freakin’ Marry Me Already?!
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description:
Lily and Marshall decide to run off and elope in this week’s episode, “Atlantic City”.
After six months apart, the faithful couple are back together and are going to get married. Frightened by the idea of having to face their families since their first failed wedding, the pair decide to marry in Atlantic City with the [...]
item.content:encoded:
Lily and Marshall decide to run off and elope in this week’s episode, “Atlantic City”.

After six months apart, the faithful couple are back together and are going to get married. Frightened by the idea of having to face their families since their first failed wedding, the pair decide to marry in Atlantic City with the rest of the gang in tow. When all does not going according plan Lily and Marshall decide to find a ship captain to marry them in international waters despite the $5000 price tag to do so.

Where on earth did Robin find her hideous “bridesmaid’s shirt”? Why is Ted so fascinated by it? Why are all these Chinese men saying hello to Barney? And will Lily and Marshall finally get married???

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

item.title: The Doctor’s Companion Special Edition – Movie News
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description: The Doctor is headed to the big screen and Scott and Matt have a lot to say on the subject. Director David Yates (Harry Potter 5-8) has been hired by the BBC to direct a complete reboot of the Doctor Who franchise as a film series. Can a “regenerated” version of Doctor Who work? How [...]
item.content:encoded: The Doctor is headed to the big screen and Scott and Matt have a lot to say on the subject. Director David Yates (Harry Potter 5-8) has been hired by the BBC to direct a complete reboot of the Doctor Who franchise as a film series. Can a “regenerated” version of Doctor Who work? How do we feel about the news? What are some of the actors we DON’T want to see as the big screen Doctor and who do we agree would make a great big screen Master? Find out in this Special Edition of The Doctor’s Companion!

item.title: The Doctor’s Companion Ep. 77 – What’s In A Name?
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description: The Doctor believes he’s meeting himself while Scott and Matt are having fun returning to the Davies era fun with the David Tennant 2008 Christmas special “The Next Doctor”. It’s Christmas Eve 1851 and the Doctor has arrived to investigate a Cyberman infiltration of Victorian London, just to find another Doctor already on the case. [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Doctor believes he’s meeting himself while Scott and Matt are having fun returning to the Davies era fun with the David Tennant 2008 Christmas special “The Next Doctor”. It’s Christmas Eve 1851 and the Doctor has arrived to investigate a Cyberman infiltration of Victorian London, just to find another Doctor already on the case. Is this man really one of the Doctor’s future regenerations? Are they enough to stop the rise of the CyberKing? What do the Cybermen want with all of these kids? Find out in the newest episode of The Doctor’s Companion! And remember, BEWARE OF SPOILERS!!

Next: Sylvester McCoy and “Delta and the Bannermen”!!

item.title: The Doctor’s Companion Ep. 76 – Showdown!
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description: The Doctor’s in the wild west but Scott and Matt disagree about the William Hartnell 4-part serial “The Gunfighters”. The Doctor, along with his companions Steven and Dodo, go to the town of Tombstone in the old west for a holiday. After a band of gunmen mistake the Doctor for Doc Holliday, they hold Steven [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Doctor’s in the wild west but Scott and Matt disagree about the William Hartnell 4-part serial “The Gunfighters”. The Doctor, along with his companions Steven and Dodo, go to the town of Tombstone in the old west for a holiday. After a band of gunmen mistake the Doctor for Doc Holliday, they hold Steven and Dodo hostage until the Doctor will come to meet his death. Can the Doctor save his companions and himself before it’s too late? What song is continuously played throughout this story? Just how many shots can an old west lawman have on the job? Find out in the newest episode of The Doctor’s Companion! And remember, BEWARE OF SPOILERS!!

Next: David Tennant and “The Next Doctor”!!

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #29 – What’s Your Name Again?
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description: John Pavlich returns to Have You Met Ted this week to discuss the episode “Swarley”. After some encouragement from Ted, Marshall spreads his bachelor wings and asks a girl other than Lily out on a date. All seems to be well until Barney and Ted tell Marshall his new squeeze has “the crazy eyes”. Lily [...]
item.content:encoded:
John Pavlich returns to Have You Met Ted this week to discuss the episode “Swarley”.

After some encouragement from Ted, Marshall spreads his bachelor wings and asks a girl other than Lily out on a date. All seems to be well until Barney and Ted tell Marshall his new squeeze has “the crazy eyes”. Lily does her best to cope with her former fiancee moving on in spite of the fact she still loves him. Meanwhile, after a case of mistaken identity, Barney is christened with a new name – which the gang use profusely!

Does Chloe really have the crazy eyes? Will Marshall be able to call it off before something bad happens? What will Lily do to stop Marshall from dating? And which name will Barney go with: Swarley or Jennifer?

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below

item.title: Have You Met Ted? #28 – When I Grow Up I Wanna Be A…
item.dc:creator: AussieSlayerette
item.description: Lily is struggling to find her life’s passion in this week’s episode “Aldrin Justice”. Still reeling from the upsetting events in her life over the previous few months, Lily just doesn’t know who she is or what she wants to be. After a series of unsuccessful and short-lived careers, she takes a job at Ted’s [...]
item.content:encoded:
Lily is struggling to find her life’s passion in this week’s episode “Aldrin Justice”.

Still reeling from the upsetting events in her life over the previous few months, Lily just doesn’t know who she is or what she wants to be. After a series of unsuccessful and short-lived careers, she takes a job at Ted’s architecture firm as an office assistant. When Ted’s boss proves himself to be mean, Lily decides to take matters into her own hands to teach him a lesson. Meanwhile Marshall is having trouble at law school when his professor takes her bad divorce out on her students. Barney steps up to save his friend’s grades by trying to “tame the cougar”.

Why did Lily take Mr Druthers’ ball? Can Ted convince her to give it back? What does the building really look like? And can Barney get Professor Lewis to grade higher than a B+?

Find out the answers to these questions and more in this week’s podcast!

Show Artwork by Ash Jeffs.

Email Hayley: HYMT AT Geekshow DOT us or comment below
